text: Claude Foussier (19 April 1925 - 13 December 2010) was a French sports shooter. Foussier competed in the trap event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2010 deaths Category:French male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of France Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Paris
title: Claude Foussier
